articles.title: Greetings to Kuwaiti Emir
articles.content:
Greetings to Kuwaiti Emir
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, emir of Kuwait, on the occasions of the 56th anniversary of its independence and the 26th anniversary of its liberation.
					 Wishing the emir good health and happiness, the message hoped he and the Kuwaiti people would register greater success in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 It expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop.

articles.title: Greetings to Kuwaiti PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Kuwaiti PM
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting to Jaber Al Mubarak Al Hamad Al Sabah, prime minister of Kuwait, on Saturday on the occasions of the 56th anniversary of its independence and the 26th anniversary of its liberation.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop in the common interests and wished the Kuwaiti people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: With No Last-ditch Effort Can Park Geun Hye Group Escape Their Miserable Fate: Spokesman for NRC
articles.content:
With No Last-ditch Effort Can Park Geun Hye Group Escape Their Miserable Fate: Spokesman for NRC
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Under the influence of sky-high spirit of the angry public the "Constitutional Court" of south Korea clarified its stand to conclude the impeachment trial of Park Geun Hye at the earliest date, according to south Korean media.
					 Much upset by this, Chongwadae and those of the defense counsel hired by Park are absurdly insisting that the final pleadings at the "Constitutional Court" should be delayed, talking about "adequate inquiry" and "impartiality." They are running the whole gamut of tricks such as far-fetched assertions, chicanery and intimidation in a cunning bid to delay the impeachment trial, claiming that they would not rule out the resignation of all members of the defense counsel and Park might make a personal statement at the trial.
					
					 A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council (NRC) in a statement on Friday said the strong waves of the all-people resistance sweeping south Korea is an eruption of pent-up grudge and indignation against the Park group of traitors that has been hell-bent on fascist dictatorship, unpopular politics, sycophancy toward big powers and confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Park and her accomplices are holding confabs at a back room of Chongwadae every day, where they call for applying for witnesses in addition and pressurizing the special investigation team and the "Constitutional Court." They are running helter-skelter as the end of traitor Park is imminent. 
					
					 The ultra-right conservative group's moves against impeachment are no more than a poor and mean farce of betes noires blowing hot and cold, unable to judge what is right or wrong. They are just criminals hired by Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil. 
					
					 Impeachment of Park is an inevitability of history, requirement of the times and demand of the public.
					
					 The miserable doom of Park has already been sealed and the conservative group is fated to meet total destruction.
					
					 No force on earth can quell the strong aspiration and desire of south Koreans of various circles to terminate all sorts of injustice and bring about a new world.
					
					 The pubic mindset precisely means justice and those going against it are bound to be buried at the grave of history.
					
					 The group of traitors should properly understand that with no last-ditch efforts can they escape their miserable fate already sealed.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand on UN Charter Clarified
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand on UN Charter Clarified
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegate recently addressed an annual session of the Special Committee on the Charter of the United Nations and on the Strengthening of the Role of the Organization.
					 The delegate clarified the DPRK's principled stand as follows, taking note of the report A/RES/71/146 presented by the special committee to the session:
					
					 The DPRK's measure for bolstering up its nuclear force is a legitimate step for self-defense as it is aimed to reliably defend the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence from the U.S. and its vassal forces' nuclear war threat and ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula and security in the region.
					
					 No one is entitled to fault this legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 So far the U.S. and other nations, including the DPRK's neighboring countries, have launched various types of rockets including ICBM in succession.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the UN Security Council has adopted illegal "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK in which they condemned the latter's nuclear test for self-defense, launches of satellites for peaceful purposes and regular launches of ballistic rockets as "threats to world peace and security" without any international legal ground. Yet, it showed double-standards of keeping mum about the U.S. and other countries' tests.
					
					 The UNSC should no longer allow the acts of the U.S. abusing the UN as a theatre of high-handed and arbitrary practices but realize the UN's democratization with the reform of its Security Council as a key point, as required by world society.
					
					 It is a very urgent issue to avert the danger of a war and defend peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Every year the U.S. conducts, under the pretext of "annual and defensive", several large-scale joint military drills, nuclear war drills for bringing down a member of the UN, quite contrary to the purpose and principle of the UN Charter. What matters is that such war exercises are openly staged under the signboard of "UN Command"
					
					 The "UN Command" should be dismantled without delay in view of recovering the political entity and fame of the UN and in view of ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the Asian-Pacific region.
					
					 The reality proves once again that the democratization of the UN should be realized as soon as possible as required by world community.

articles.title: NRI Exposes Park Geun Hye's Crimes during Her Four Years of Office
articles.content:
NRI Exposes Park Geun Hye's Crimes during Her Four Years of Office
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute (NRI) on Saturday made public a white paper to denounce the crimes committed by traitor Park Geun Hye for the past four years of office after she became boss of Chongwadae through sordid media manipulation and deceptive political coup.
					 Four years of her office were characterized by people's mounting wrath and indignation at her act of lynching their desire for reunification, by nightmare and hell-like life as she inflicted unbearable misfortune and pain on the south Koreans and shame and disgrace by unhesitatingly selling off the dignity and the interests of the nation, the white paper said, and went on:
					
					 During her office the traitor made wild remarks slandering the dignity and social system of the DPRK more than hundreds of times in public.
					
					 In the first year, she, in collusion with puppet military warmongers, worked out operational plans for making precision missile strike at monuments praying for the immortality of the leaders in the north and praising their exploits and even drafted the "priority list of targets".
					
					 In February last year she openly cried out for "regime change in the north".
					
					 Her hysteric fit found extreme manifestation in her "speech marking the day of ROK army" on October 1 last year.
					
					 She spouted such invective as "giving up development of nuclear weapons," "hunger and tyranny," "provocation by the north regime and end to unethical rule."
					
					 For the past four years she, in collusion with her master, staged more than 40 provocative and aggression war drills under various codenames on a yearly average with more than one million puppet troops involved, thereby escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 In conspiracy with the American master, she rounded off or applied to an actual war drills new nuclear war scenarios targeting the north even though they had been in the phase of discussion or had not been proposed under the preceding regime.
					
					 The worst crime committed by Park was her decision to introduce THAAD into south Korea. 
					
					 The confrontation-minded dragon lady branded the DPRK's fair and above-board proposal for improving the north-south relations as "camouflaged peace offensive" and "dialogue without sincerity" for no justifiable reason. She also branded the proposal for military authorities' talks between the north and the south which the DPRK made in order to prevent military conflict between the two sides and defuse tension on the Korean peninsula as the one aimed at "conflicts among south Koreans" and "hobbled international efforts for putting sanctions on the north."
					
					 At "commemoration of March 1" and on several other occasions she went frantic, calling for "making the north regime collapse through international cooperation." She even egged citizens of the DPRK on to "defect from the north".
					
					 She shut down the Kaesong Industrial Park, a product of the June 15 era and the last lifeline of the north-south relations. 
					
					 As a result, lots of south Korean businesses who had been dependent on the park suffered huge economic losses amounting to billions of U.S. dollars either to go bankrupt or to be reduced to small ones. This also left more than 200,000 south Korean workers jobless overnight.
					
					 Due to the traitor's fascist oppression, the Unified Progressive Party, a legitimate political party, was forced into disbandment on absurd charges of attempted rebellion and Jaju Minbo which advocated independence and progress was forcibly closed. A great many organizations comprising people of various social standings which stood for democracy of society and right to existence were branded as "parasite-like entity", "enemy inside south Korea" and "enemy-benefiting organization" and over 3,000 cultural organizations and nearly 10,000 people of culture and arts were blacklisted to be subject to all kinds of political persecution and suppression.
					
					 From mid-April to early May 2015 Park hurled riot police to fire over 79,000 liters of water with cannons at participants of peaceful rallies and demonstrations. The amount of water reached as many as 40,000 liters at night of May Day alone and poisonous gas that was spread in this period reached more than 700 liters or 3.7 times the total amount used the year before.
					
					 South Korea's "national debt" reached 1,170 billion US dollars, hitting all time high, the number of the unemployed stood at more than 4.5 million or  23.3 percent increase over the first year of her office and that of the underemployed reached over 10 million while the rate of unemployed young people registered 34.6 percent, an all-time high.
					
					 8.5 million families accounting for 47 percent of the families in south Korea barely make their ends meet in rented rooms, small cells, plastic houses, plank houses and cardboard houses. More than 5.7 million under the absolute poverty line barely make their living, being unable to earn the minimum living expenses. The number of suicides is on the steady increase.
					
					 Ferry Sewol sinking disaster, MERS chaos, humidifier disinfectant case and other cases make people tremble with anger as they are deliberate massacres committed by the traitor who does not regard people's lives worth those of flies.
					
					 Park still had the face to hurt the DPRK, flower garden full of love for the people, while shelving vices in south Korea.
					
					 She set up the UN "office on human rights in north", an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization, in south Korea which her predecessors dared not and in March last year retrieved anti-reunification document that had been disregarded at the "National Assembly" for more than 10 years, thus enacting "law on human rights in the north".
					
					 Park began man-hunting targeting citizens of the DPRK. When operations were conducted to lure and abduct inhabitants of the north, she directly controlled and monitored them after coiling herself up in the underground air-raid shelter in Chongwadae, thus displaying her skill as a boss in skirt.
					
					 Last year this dragon lady abducted in group in broad daylight 12 women citizens of the DPRK who had been working overseas and have kept them away from outside contacts and have pressed them to "surrender" through shuddering spiritual and physical pain, persecution, appeasement, deception, threat and blackmail.
					
					 All Koreans will certainly mete out the most merciless and severest punishment to her so that there would no repetition of such tragedy in which serpents like Park bring harm of all descriptions to the nation.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly led by Chairman Choe Thae Bok came back home Saturday after paying an official visit to Iran and attending the 6th international conference in support of the Palestinian people held in this country.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots Leave
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Leave
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by Chairman Yun Kil Sang left here Saturday.
					Departing earlier was Kim Won Baek, member of the Federation of Koreans in Canada.

articles.title: Int'l Games to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Int'l Games to Be Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Different international games will be held in the DPRK this year.
					 Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK will sponsor the 28th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, and the 20th World Taekwon-Do Championships from September 15 to 21. Pyongyang was the venue for the 8th and 17th World Taekwon-Do Championships in 1992 and 2011.
					
					 And the 2017 World Youth Judo Championship is slated for October. In the past, the DPRK produced many judo aces, including Olympic gold medalist and quadruple world champion.
					
					 Meanwhile, group B matches for the AFC Women's Asian Cup Jordan 2018 Qualifiers will take place in April and the home-and-away matches of group I for the 2017 AFC Cup from March to May.

articles.title: New Method of Sterilizing Mushroom Substrate Developed
articles.content:
New Method of Sterilizing Mushroom Substrate Developed
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A new method of sterilizing mushroom substrate with ozone was developed in the DPRK.
					 The new method cuts down the sterilization by 10 hours to the maximum and drastically decreases contamination, while helping harvest mushroom a week earlier than usual and boost the production by 1.5 times.
					
					 It has been pushed forward in the country to markedly increase the production of fruits, vegetables and mushroom for the people's diet.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Ideological Campaign in This Year's All-out Charge
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Ideological Campaign in This Year's All-out Charge
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial calls upon all the people to win a shining victory in this year's all-out charge through a dynamic ideological revolution under the guidance of the great Party.
					 The editorial says that it is the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to bring about a great leap forward and innovations in every work site for building a socialist power by waging a drive for uninterrupted innovations and progress through a vigorous ideological campaign.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The whole course of the Korean revolution was a history of the ideological campaign for fully displaying the might of truth taught by the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. The army and people of the DPRK defeated the imperialist formidable enemies by dint of ideology, built a socialist country, independent, self-supporting and self-reliant, with its strength and opened an avenue to building a socialist power by dint of it. It is socialist Korea which has won victories only while grasping the revolutionary idea of the leader as the lifeline and bringing about giant creations and changes through the steady ideological campaign.
					
					 The WPK is dynamically advancing the cause of building a socialist power by giving full rein to the mental power of all servicepersons and civilians through a revolutionary ideological offensive under the unfurled banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. The importance of the ideological work was underscored again and reconfirmed, a revolutionary turn was effected on the front of the Party ideological work and the DPRK's politico-ideological base markedly grew stronger with the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the WPK as a momentum.
					
					 The cause of the Korean revolution is sure to triumph as it is advancing by dint of ideology, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Projected U.S.-S. Korea Saber-rattling against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Projected U.S.-S. Korea Saber-rattling against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is going to stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills with the south Korean puppet forces in March again.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article in this regard: These joint military drills are grave ones for preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK in violation of its sovereignty and an open provocation for bringing a nuclear disaster to the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Recalling that through the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle the U.S. and south Korean forces have comprehensively examined and rounded off the capability to rapidly deploy the aggressor forces in the Korean peninsula and readiness for joint operations and acquired the capability for making a preemptive nuclear strike at strategic depth and major bases of the DPRK, the article goes on:
					
					 After making THAAD deployment an established fact for the first time in its history, the U.S. is mulling staging a drill for its use and applying the "4D OPLAN" for preemptive attack on the DPRK with precision nuclear strike means.
					
					 The grave situation today when the U.S. is bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula eloquently proves that how just the DPRK was when it had access to powerful nuclear deterrent under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The DPRK has the single-minded unity of the army and people, which nobody can understand by the West's outlook on value and way of calculation, and the matchless armed forces trained by the great Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 It is the steadfast resolution and will of the army and people of the DPRK to beat back the aggressors attacking with nukes in kind and achieve genuine peace.

articles.title: Tok Islets Are Part of Inviolable Territory of Korea: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Tok Islets Are Part of Inviolable Territory of Korea: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Japanese Foreign Minister Kishida in a recent diplomatic address at the Diet again spouted a flurry of invective that Tok islets are part of the "territory of Japan". He made a litany of such assertions every year since he took the office as foreign minister.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this a sinister intention to make Tok islets part of Japan's territory and a foolish and childish ploy of those obsessed with the moves to grab Tok islets by ceaselessly telling lies. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Tok islets are part of an inviolable territory of the Korean nation as recognized historically and by international law. This admits of no shred of doubt.
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries still insist on the above-said claim. What merits more serious attention is that the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan made public the new teaching manuals the keynote of which is that Tok islets are the "territory belonging to Japan," the first of its kind. 
					
					 Lurking behind this farce is a sinister intention to make the younger generations understand Tok islets as "usurped territory" in a bid to train them as maniacs obsessed with the idea of seeking revenge and launching aggression. 
					
					 Their final goal is to use them as a shock brigade in the operations to grab Tok islets and, furthermore, invade the whole of Korea and advance into the continent to realize at any cost the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" which they failed to do in the past.
					
					 Anyhow, Tok Islets will always remain part of the inviolable territory of Korea. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are well advised to drop their wild ambition for territorial expansion.

articles.title: Minju Joson Supports S. Korean People's Struggle against Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Minju Joson Supports S. Korean People's Struggle against Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Today a large-scale all-out people's action to impeach Park Geun Hye is to be held in south Korea.
					 It is beyond doubt that the said action, planned on the day marking the fourth year since Park took office, would serve as an occasion of hastening the sentence of ruin to be passed on the group of traitors in their last-minute maneuvers now, Minju Joson says in a commentary Saturday. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Park's group challenge head-on the people's mindset desirous of the earlier impeachment of Park with such rhetoric as "lack of objectivity" and "no relation with price-paying" and through procrastination. It is nothing but a shameless attitude.
					
					 In particular, the gentries of the "Liberal Korea Party" claimed that "even criminal should have his or her human rights guaranteed" and the "demand of impeachment constitutes threat and blackmail" and openly stood against the massive anti-Park Geun Hye candlelight actions while bluffing "we can do something now."
					
					 This shows that the south Korean people must not give up their struggle till the moment Park is brought to justice and cruel punishment is sentenced to her and that the struggle should be conducted together with the action against the conservatives.
					
					 People of various circles in south Korea would fight it out to deal a telling blow of justice to vile Park who is lost to the elementary decency as a human being and the ability to discern things.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Conspiratorial Plots of Human Rights Abusers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Conspiratorial Plots of Human Rights Abusers
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Taken aback by the rapidly rising strategic position of the DPRK, the south Korean puppet forces are busy hatching sinister plots against the DPRK. 
					 They held a "consultative meeting on the policy of human rights in the north" at which they cooked up an "advisory committee" for it while talking about the "promotion of human rights" of someone. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The desperate anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign kicked off by the puppet regime is aimed to justify its policy of confrontation with compatriots at any cost, though it is on the verge of total bankruptcy. 
					
					 With no rhetoric can the puppet group justify the provocative campaign being staged under the signboard of "human rights." 
					
					 The desperate efforts being made by the puppet group to bring down the best socialist system centered on the popular masses would only bring to light their true colors as the worst human rights abusers.
					
					 The puppet forces' anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign is nothing but a cynical ploy to cover up the grisly human rights situation in the south Korean society driven into utter chaos owing to their unpopular rule and divert elsewhere the attention of the angered public in a bid to prolong their remaining days.
					
					 Tricksters must bear in mind that no matter what noisy smear campaign they may kick up against the north like rabid dogs, they can never hide their true colors as human rights abusers.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Yun Pyong Se's Inane Diplomacy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Yun Pyong Se's Inane Diplomacy
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet foreign minister of south Korea, during his recent junket to Germany, held a sinister meeting with his American and Japanese masters at which he malignantly slandered the DPRK over its measures to bolster up its nuclear deterrence and cried out for pressurizing it to "dismantle its nukes" and "abide by the UN resolutions".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a disgusting behavior of the confrontation maniac who goes reckless, regardless of time and place.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are earnestly begging their masters to ratchet up the pressure on the DPRK and the international community to implement the UN "sanctions resolutions".
					
					 This only clearly proves that the system of cooperation in confrontation with the DPRK has gone totally bust.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces' ceaseless call for the DPRK's "dismantlement of its nukes" and "abidance by the UN resolutions" is little short of confession that no desperate efforts can help prevent it from remarkably bolstering up its nuclear offensive capability.
					
					 Whoever is obsessed by sycophancy and treachery and confrontation with compatriots is bound to lose thinking power and judgment.
					
					 No one on earth would heed Yun's rhetoric.
					
					 The confrontation maniacs' last-ditch efforts to keep afloat such "cooperation in pressurizing the north" with the help of foreign forces would only invite derision of the public at home and abroad.

articles.title: World Will Never Overlook Japan's Moves for Overseas Invasion: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
World Will Never Overlook Japan's Moves for Overseas Invasion: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Japan is behaving ridiculously, finding fault with the DPRK's test-fire of Pukguksong-2 and talking about a drill of intercepting it and introduction of a new type hardware.
					 Its government said that it would shape a detailed counter plan through the quick examination of the introduction of new-type hardware to strengthen the alert posture for interception and reflect it in its 2019-2023 Midterm Defense Adjustment Plan.
					
					 It was reported that according to it, the Japanese Ministry of Defense would soon start the examination of the introduction of new-type hardware at the committee for building the combined mobilization defense capability.
					
					 Meanwhile, the naval general staff of the Ministry of Defense announced that it would conduct a mock drill aimed at improving the alert posture for launching a missile and interception to cope with the threat from the DPRK's ballistic missiles together with the 7th Fleet of the U.S. Navy.
					
					 The moves stepped up by Japan in the wake of the DPRK's test-fire of Pukguksong-2 are being ridiculed by the world community as foolish attempts to cover its ambition for overseas invasion under the pretext of the former's missile test-fire.
					
					 Since its defeat, Japan has remained unchanged in its ambition for overseas invasion.
					
					 Japan has systematically increased its military spending under the pretext of acquiring military muscle commensurate with its economic potential, thus becoming the country with the highest speed in the growth of military spending in the world.
					
					 At the end of last year the Japanese Mainichi Shimbun reported that the government decided to allot five trillion and a hundred billion yen as military spending in the budget for the fiscal 2017.
					
					 Under the present Abe regime Japan's ambition for emerging a military giant and launching overseas aggression reached the climax. The scale of military hardware of the "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF) is as large as that of world military powers. Japan is capable of manufacturing nuclear weapons any time it wants and has even means for their delivery in place.
					
					 The operational sphere of the "SDF" has no geographical limit. According to the revised Japan-U.S. Defence Cooperation Guidelines, it was expanded worldwide.
					
					 The SDF has completely turned into the offensive-type armed forces for aggression.
					
					 The DPRK is its primary target. It is the calculation of Japan to attain the position of the leading power in Asia even by offering its whole archipelago as an advance base of the U.S. for invading the continent while zealously following the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, however, should not miscalculate.
					
					 Asia today is no longer what used to be in the past and Korea, once trampled underfoot by Japan as a distress-torn land, has attained the proud position of a nuclear power in the East.
					
					 The world including Northeast Asia will never remain a passive onlooker to Japan's moves for overseas aggression.

articles.title: S. Koreans Flails FM for Demanding Removal of Girl Statue
articles.content:
S. Koreans Flails FM for Demanding Removal of Girl Statue
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea reportedly made public a statement on Thursday to condemn the puppet Foreign Ministry for demanding the removal of the girl statue in Pusan.
					 Noting that the Foreign Ministry sent an official notice demanding the removal of the girl statue in front of the Japanese consulate general in Pusan, talking about international practice, the statement said:
					
					 The Foreign Ministry does not make positive efforts for human rights of south Korean people but violates international practice by demanding the removal of the girl statue under the pressure of the Japanese government.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se have already lost qualifications and we urge them to step down at once in the name of the people.

articles.title: Campaign for Legislation against Discrimination Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Campaign for Legislation against Discrimination Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Legislation against Discrimination, grouping more than 40 labor movement organizations in south Korea, declared a campaign for legislation against discrimination on Feb. 23, according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 A press conference was called in Seoul in this regard.
					
					 Speakers at the conference noted that the labor circle has struggled for such legislation for one decade.
					
					 They said that the survey results made public by the "Human Rights Committee" showed that part-timers, the disabled and women have been subject to the most unbearable discrimination in the society.

articles.title: Majority of S. Koreans Demand Park Geun Hye's Impeachment
articles.content:
Majority of S. Koreans Demand Park Geun Hye's Impeachment
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea made public the results of opinion poll on the impeachment of Park Geun Hye on February 23, according to the south Korean Kukmin Ilbo.
					 74 percent of the respondents asserted the impeachment of Park Geun Hye and 68.8 percent demanded the extension of the period for special investigation into "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal" in the opinion poll conducted among 1 200 men and women aged above 19 across south Korea.
					
					 The number of respondents supporting the candlelight action for impeaching Park Geun Hye reached 71 percent and 76.3 percent of them stood against her attitude of not recognizing her crimes and evading responsibility.

articles.title: Meeting of Chairmen of Headquarters of Korean Youth League in Japan
articles.content:
Meeting of Chairmen of Headquarters of Korean Youth League in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting of chairmen of the Headquarters of the Korean Youth League in Japan was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 13-15.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, chairmen of the Headquarters of the youth league in different parts of Japan and officials of the league.
					
					 At the meeting Ho Jong Man stressed the need for the Korean Youth League in Japan to carry through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and New Year message and thus display patriotism and loyalty and consolidate its branches as a bulwark of patriotism.
					
					 He called upon the league officials to firmly prepare themselves as those strong in faith and reserves of core officials of Chongryon possessed of a high level of political and ideological preparedness, ability and revolutionary work style.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Dominica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Dominica
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Kelvis Publishing House of Dominica brought out in booklet "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution", a work of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, on Feb. 12 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Carried by Czech Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Carried by Czech Newspaper
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's brief biography was carried in the January-February issue of the Czech newspaper Dialog.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Indian Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Indian Newspapers
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Indian newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Feb. 3rd issue of the newspaper Indian and World Event allotted two whole pages to articles of various titles illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il. The newspaper introduced in detail his feats for the socialist cause.
					
					 The Feb. 9th issue of Ocean News Point allotted one whole page to an article titled "Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the DPRK" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The Feb. 8th issue of New Delhi Times said in an article titled "The DPRK's self-development" that one of the factors by which the Korean army and people could bring about the world-startling miracles and changes in grim annals of the revolution is the self-development based on the Juche idea.
					
					 The Feb. 11th issue of Awaking elaborated in an article titled "Ushering in a fresh era of independent reunification" the exploits of Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to realizing the Korean nation's cause of reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Peru and South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Peru and South Africa
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian personage and a South African organization issued statements in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Julio Cesar Pantigoso Barretto, chairman of the Chiclayo and Trujillo Branch of the Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship, said in his statement on February 16:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great leader and statesman who developed in depth the Juche idea and thoroughly applied it in the revolution and construction to powerfully promote the building of a socialist power in the DPRK and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 He conducted energetic activities to strengthen friendship and solidarity with the peoples of countries aspiring after independence.
					
					 The Peruvian people are highly praising him for having constantly adhered to the Juche-based and revolutionary stand.
					
					 The Mfumalanga Provincial Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of South Africa in its statement on February 7 praised the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who was born and grew up in Mt Paektu, hearing gunfire during the great anti-Japanese war.
					
					 The DPRK fought against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to defend its sovereignty.
					
					 It is a powerful nuclear weapons state, recognized by not only the DPRK's friends but also the enemies.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included meetings, seminars, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Myanmar, Romania and India between February 2 and 10.
					
					 On display at their venues were photos showing the revolutionary career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and books and photos introducing the Korean army and people in the efforts to open up a golden age in building a socialist power.
					
					 "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said that Kim Jong Il was not only the great leader of the Korean people but also a prominent leader of the world revolution.
					
					 His distinguished feat is that he enriched the Juche idea, founded by President Kim Il Sung, to provide the powerful ideo-theoretical weapon to the world progressive people struggling for independence, the secretary stressed.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, said that Kim Jong Il had enjoyed boundless reverence of all peoples for his distinguished ideo-theoretical wisdom, extraordinary leadership and noble popular traits.
					
					 S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, and Vipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, said that there was no such great person in history as Kim Jong Il who had performed titanic feats for the global cause of independence with his great idea and leadership.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a emir de Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a emir de Kuwait
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 25 al emir del Estado de Kuwait, Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, un mensaje de felicitacion con motivo del 56o aniversario de la independencia y el 26o de la liberacion de Kuwait.
					En su misiva, el remitente deseo al destinatario buena salud y felicidad y al emir y su pueblo mayores exitos por el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais y expreso la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran sin cesar las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre ambos paises.

articles.title: CRN condena intento de posponer alegato final sobre la dimision de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRN condena intento de posponer alegato final sobre la dimision de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- Segun medios surcoreanos, la "Corte Constitucional" del Sur de Corea, resignada a la fuerte demanda de los habitantes encolerizados por el escandalo de Park Geun-hye, expuso recientemente la posicion de concluir en breve el juicio sobre la dimision de ella.
					Aturdidos por esa decision, los tipejos de Chongwadae y el panel de abogados venales se obstinan en posponer el alegato final de la "Corte Constitucional" pretextando la "investigacion suficiente" y la "imparcialidad".
					
					Para dilatar a toda costa el juicio del caso, utilizan todos los medios como engano, chantaje e intriga y presentan opiniones absurdas de que todo el panel de abogados puede renunciar la defensa y Park Geun-hye puede declarar personalmente ante el tribunal.
					
					El portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional, en una declaracion publicada el dia 24, insiste en que la resistencia popular que azota todo el suelo surcoreano es una explosion del rencor e indignacion acumulados contra la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye que se ha dedicado a la dictadura fascista, la politica antipopular, el servilismo a grandes potencias, la traicion a la patria y la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Sin embargo, Park y sus complices se reunen casi todos los dias a puertas cerradas en Chongwadae para discutir contramedidas como aumentar el numero de testigos y presionar a los inspectores especiales y la "Corte Constitucional", senala el portavoz y continua:
					
					Ahora, se ponen mas desesperados ya que se acerca el fin de la diabla de Chongwadae.
					
					Los conservadores ultraderechistas tratan de impedir la dimision de Park porque fueron sobornados por el dinero ilegalmente acumulado por ella y Choe Sun Sil.
					
					La dimision es un hecho inevitable de la historia, la demanda de la epoca y la orden de la opinion publica.
					
					Son fatales el fin tragico de Park y el colapso general de las fuerzas conservadoras.
					
					Nada puede frustrar la aspiracion de los habitantes surcoreanos a construir un nuevo mundo erradicando todo tipo de injusticia.
					
					La justicia reside en la opinion publica y los opositores a esta seran enterrados en la tumba de la historia.
					
					La camarilla de traidores surcoreanos deben conocer que no puede salvar de ninguna manera su destino que se va apagando.

articles.title: Representante coreano expone la posicion de principios de RPDC en reunion de ONU
articles.content:
Representante coreano expone la posicion de principios de RPDC en reunion de ONU
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el representante de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo uso de la palabra en la reunion anual del comite especial sobre la Carta de la ONU y el mejoramiento del papel de la organizacion.
					Tomando en consideracion el informe (A/RES/71/146) del comite especial, presentado ante la reunion, el delegado coreano expuso la siguiente posicion de principios de la RPDC.
					
					Las medidas de la RPDC destinadas al fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares devienen las autodefensivas para defender confiablemente la soberania del pais y el derecho a la subsistencia de la nacion desde las amenazas de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y sus satelites y salvaguardar fidedignamente la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la seguridad de la region.
					
					Este derecho legitimo del Estado soberano no puede ser criticado por nadie.
					
					Hasta la fecha, EE.UU., los vecinos de Corea y otros paises lanzan sucesivamente los misiles balisticos intercontinentales y otros cohetes.
					
					Pero, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU muestra la extremidad de la norma de doble rasero de guardar silencio ante las pruebas de esos paises mientras que aprobo las ilegales "resoluciones de sancion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cuestionando sin ningun fundamento juridico internacional como "amenaza a la paz y la seguridad internacionales" la prueba nuclear autodefensiva, el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos y el lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos de la RPDC.
					
					El CS de la ONU no debe perdonar mas los actos de EE.UU. que abusa de la ONU como la escena de la coaccion y arbitrariedad, sino realizar lo mas pronto posible la democratizacion de esta organizacion internacional dando prioridad a la reforma del CS segun la demanda de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Se presentan como un problema impostergable la prevencion de guerra y la defensa de paz y seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En contraste con el objetivo y los principios de la Carta de la ONU, el imperio norteamericano libra cada ano en varias ocasiones los ejercicios conjuntos militares de guerra nuclear para derrocar un pais miembro de la ONU, bajo las mascaras "anales y defensivas".
					
					Lo problematico es que tales maniobras belicas se perpetran abiertamente bajo el nombre de la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de la ONU".
					
					Hay que disolverse sin demora la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de la ONU" no solo para recuperar la sustancia imparcial y honra de la ONU, sino tambien para asegurar la paz y la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana y la region Asia-Pacifico.
					
					La realidad vuelve a confirmar la realizacion pronta de la democratizacion de la ONU, como lo demanda la sociedad internacional. -0-

articles.title: IRP enumera crimenes de Park Geun-hye cometidos en 4 anos de su mandato
articles.content:
IRP enumera crimenes de Park Geun-hye cometidos en 4 anos de su mandato
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se cumplen 4 anos desde cuando la traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye se hizo duena de Chongwadae mediante la sucia manipulacion de la opinion publica y el golpe de Estado politico caracterizado por el engano al pueblo, el Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publica el dia 25 una carta blanca para revelar sus crimenes cometidos durante ese periodo.
					Ese cuatrienio fue el tiempo de indignacion, pesadilla, verguenza y afrenta en que esa traidora sofoco la aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion, impuso intolerables desgracias y sufrimientos a la poblacion surcoreana y vendio la dignidad e intereses nacionales a las fuerzas extranjeras, senala el documento y continua:
					
					En cientos de ocasiones, la traidora calumnio atrevidamente en lugares publicos la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					En el primer ano de su mandato, trazo junto con los belicistas del circulo militar el plan operacional para atacar a precision con misiles los monumentos de homenaje al lider, levantados por doquier de la RPDC, y elaboro hasta la "lista de los que deben ser eliminados por orden". 
					
					En febrero del ano pasado, abogo abiertamente por el "cambio del poder norcoreano". 
					
					Su histeria llego al climax cuando ella pronuncio el "discurso por el Dia de las Fuerzas Armadas" el primero de octubre del ano pasado.
					
					Dijo disparates como "renuncia de desarrollo de armas nucleares", "hambre y represion violenta" y "acabar con la provocacion y dominacion antietica del poder norcoreano". 
					
					Durante 4 anos, libro en mas de 40 ocasiones como promedio anual los ejercicios belicos de caracter provocativo y agresivo junto con EE.UU. movilizando un millon y cientos de miles de efectivos. 
					
					En confabulacion con su amo gringo, completo nuevos guiones de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC que en los "poderes" anteriores, estaban en discusion o ni habian sido presentados siquiera, y los aplico en los ejercicios de combate real. 
					
					Decidio introducir en suelo surcoreano el sistema antimisiles norteamericano THAAD, lo cual es el peor "merito" de la maniaca de guerra.
					
					Calumnio la justa propuesta de la parte connacional sobre la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas como "ofensiva disfrazada de paz" y "dialogo carente de sinceridad". 
					
					Y nego hasta la propuesta de la RPDC de sostener las conversaciones de autoridades militares Norte-Sur para prevenir los choques armados entre ambas partes y aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana calificandola de proyecto para sembrar "discordias entre los surcoreanos" y "quebrar la sancion internacional anti-Norte". 
					
					En la "ceremonia por el Primero de Marzo" y otras ocasiones, dijo que "hay que fortalecer la colaboracion internacional para lograr el derrumbe del poder norcoreano" e incito hasta la "fuga del Norte" de los ciudadanos de la RPDC. 
					
					Cerro hasta la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, fruto de la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio y ultimo hilo de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Como resultado, muchas empresas surcoreanas sufrieron enormes perdidas economicas valoradas en miles de millones de US$ y mas de 200 mil obreros surcoreanos se quedaron sin empleo. 
					
					Debido a la gobernacion fascista de la traidora Park, el Partido Progresista Unido, legitima organizacion politica, fue disuelto por la fuerza bajo la sospecha de haber trazado un complot de rebelion. Ademas, Jaju Minbo, periodico que abogaba por la independencia y el progreso, tuvo que suspender la publicacion. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, muchas entidades, que demandaban la democratizacion de la sociedad y el derecho a la subsistencia, fueron estigmatizadas como "entes nocivos", "quintacolumnistas" y "entidades proenemigas".
					
					Mas de 3 mil entidades culturales y cerca de 10 mil hombres de cultura y artistas fueron catalogados en la lista negra siendo sometidos al hostigamiento politico de toda indole. 
					
					Desde mediados de abril hasta principios de mayo de 2015, la policia fascista, instigada por la traidora Park, disparo con canones lanzaaguas mas de 79 mil litros contra los participantes en los mitines y manifestaciones de caracter pacifico. Solo en la noche del primero de mayo, su cantidad llego a 40 mil litros. 
					
					Ademas, en ese tiempo fueron usados mas de 700 litros de lacrimogeno, equivalentes a 3.7 veces de toda la cantidad usada en 2014.
					
					En el Sur de Corea, la "deuda estatal" llego a un billon 170 mil millones de dolares marcando el record de la historia.
					
					El numero de desempleados llego a mas de 4 millones y medio con un aumento de 23.3% frente a la cifra del primer ano de mandato y el de subempleados, a 10 millones y el porcentaje de la poblacion juvenil desempleada registro el 34.6%. 
					
					Mas de 8 millones 500 mil familias, 47% de todos los nucleos familiares de la poblacion surcoreana, se ganan la vida a duras penas en los cuartos de alquiler y las casas provisionales y mas de 5 millones 700 mil viven en extrema miseria. A eso se suman los casos de suicidio que se reportan sin parar.
					
					Durante su mandato, Park cometio los crimenes de magnicidio que dejaron consternado a todo el mundo, entre ellos, la tragedia del ferry Sewol, el caso de MERS y el de esterilizante toxico de humidificador.
					
					Sin embargo, Park Geun-hye se atrevio a difamar a la RPDC donde se practican las politicas populares en todos los dominios.
					
					Instalo en el Sur de Corea la "Oficina de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU, aparato intrigante anti-RPDC de las fuerzas foraneas, a lo que no se atrevieron ni sus antecesores.
					
					En marzo de 2016, fabrico por fin la "ley de DDHH del Norte", cuya aprobacion habia sido suspendida en la "Asamblea Nacional" durante mas de 10 anos.
					
					En cada operacion de secuestro y rapto a los habitantes norcoreanos, Park demostro su habilidad de la caudilla de gangsteres controlandolos directamente en el refugio antiaereo subterraneo de Chongwadae.
					
					Hizo secuestrar a plena luz del dia a las 12 ciudadanas norcoreanas que trabajaban en el extranjero en 2016 y llevarlas al Sur de Corea. Pero, hasta la fecha, encarcela a ellas en celdas y les impone la "sumision" con horribles torturas mentales y fisicas, la persecucion, el adormecimiento y engano, la amenaza y chantaje.
					
					Todos los coreanos sentenciaran mas implacable y severamente a la traidora Park para que no se repita tal tragedia en la historia nacional.
